results.snippet: Nov 7, 2023 ... TypeScript is definitely a language. It's just JavaScript with training wheels on it. A lot of modern TS/JS programmers can't articulate the difference.

results.title: TypeScript vs JavaScript Differences - 2025 : Aalpha
results.snippet: A 2024 study by JetBrains showed that teams maintaining JavaScript codebases over five years spent 40% more time on regression fixes and rework compared to teams using TypeScript. Enterprises often adopt domain-driven design (DDD) to manage business complexity.
